name: Pumpkin Boy (Handyfon)
description:
Handyfon here, I'm a solo developer who loves to make game jam entries like this one. I hope you enjoy my weird sense of humor in this more mature story.

In this game you play as "Pumpkin Boy" collecting candy. If only life was this simple...

Controls:

- WASD or Arrows keys to move-
- Leftclick to attack
